rows.label: bf04020100_0010
rows.name:
The body may die, but never the soul,
which is merely passed on.

rows.label: bf04020100_0020
rows.name:
Souls flow onward, born and reborn,
forever part of the great ether stream.

rows.label: bf04020100_0030
rows.name:
Why friends make grave here? Can we
not take Biggipon home to village?

rows.label: bf04020100_0040
rows.name:
He'd want to be buried where he fell.
It is traditional amongst mercenaries.

rows.label: bf04020100_0050
rows.name: I'm so sorry, Vandham-san...

rows.label: bf04020100_0060
rows.name:
If only I hadn't listened to those
people, you'd still be...

rows.label: bf04020100_0070
rows.name: I'm sorry...

rows.label: bf04020100_0075
rows.name: I'm so sorry...!

rows.label: bf04020100_0080
rows.name:
It's not your fault. No matter what, those guys
would have tracked us down eventually.

rows.label: bf04020100_0090
rows.name:
What matters is that Vandham-san
saved all our lives.

rows.label: bf04020100_0100
rows.name: For now, let's just be grateful to him...for that.

rows.label: bf04020100_0110
rows.name: ...You're right...

rows.label: bf04020100_0120
rows.name: I won't forget your words, Vandham-san.

rows.label: bf04020100_0122
rows.name: Ever. I'll fight my own war. With Homura.

rows.label: bf04020100_0130
rows.name: Homura...?

rows.label: bf04020100_0140
rows.name: Are you all right?

rows.label: bf04020100_0150
rows.name: Yes...

rows.label: bf04020100_0160
rows.name:
Good. I was worried that you
might not...wake up...

rows.label: bf04020100_0170
rows.name: ...Homura, you know I've got to ask.

rows.label: bf04020100_0172
rows.name: That thing that happened yesterday...

rows.label: bf04020100_0180
rows.name: You called yourself "Hikari"?

rows.label: bf04020100_0190
rows.name: What? I - I, um...

rows.label: bf04020100_0200
rows.name:
I'd like to hear that, too.
That power...it wasn't normal.

rows.label: bf04020100_0210
rows.name:
Is that the true power of
the Holy Grail?

rows.label: bf04020100_0220
rows.name:
Please,
you have to explain to us what exactly happened.

rows.label: bf04020100_0230
rows.name:
Tora want to know too. 
Homura-chan was super strong!

rows.label: bf04020100_0240
rows.name: Why so strong? Huh?

rows.label: bf04020100_0250
rows.name: Now, now, don't pressure the girl...

rows.label: bf04020100_0260
rows.name: Well, um... The thing is... I mean...

rows.label: bf04020100_0270
rows.name: Ahh!

rows.label: bf04020100_0280
rows.name: H...Homura?

rows.label: bf04020100_0290
rows.name: Why...?

rows.label: bf04020100_0300
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: bf04020100_0310
rows.name: Why did you wake me up?!

rows.label: bf04020100_0320
rows.name: Huh? What?

rows.label: bf04020100_0330
rows.name:
I didn't want to wake up...
I didn't want to come back!

rows.label: bf04020100_0340
rows.name:
I left everything to her so I'd
never have to use that power again!

rows.label: bf04020100_0350
rows.name: But then you woke me up!

rows.label: bf04020100_0360
rows.name: W-woke you up...?

rows.label: bf04020100_0370
rows.name:
If you have been more careful,
I wouldn't have had to wake up!

rows.label: bf04020100_0380
rows.name: I wouldn't have had to use this power!

rows.label: bf04020100_0390
rows.name:
Didn't you listen to that Vandham guy?
He told you to run.

rows.label: bf04020100_0400
rows.name:
But you just had to push yourself. Idiot.
Look where it's got us now!

rows.label: bf04020100_0410
rows.name: You-

rows.label: bf04020100_0420
rows.name: You really messed up.

rows.label: bf04020100_0430
rows.name: You don't have to tell me that!

rows.label: bf04020100_0440
rows.name:
I know, all right?!
I knew I was being an idiot.

rows.label: bf04020100_0450
rows.name: Rex...

rows.label: bf04020100_0460
rows.name: But I just...

rows.label: bf04020100_0462
rows.name: I couldn't hand you over to them.

rows.label: bf04020100_0470
rows.name: I wanted to protect you.

rows.label: bf04020100_0480
rows.name: Wh-wha...?!

rows.label: bf04020100_0490
rows.name:
A-at any rate! If you've got
questions, you can ask her!

rows.label: bf04020100_0500
rows.name: I'm out of here! Bye!

rows.label: bf04020100_0510
rows.name: Ah... That's not fair...

rows.label: bf04020100_0520
rows.name: Everyone, I'm...very sorry about all that.
